mil.emp3.api.interfaces

Interface IMapService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IWMS
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WMS

    public interface IMapService
    This interface class defines the interface to all Map Services such as WMS WMTS, etc ...

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      This method retrieves the description property.
      java.util.UUID getGeoId()
      This method retrieves the unique identifier for the service.

      This method retrieves the current layer list.

      This method retrieves the name property.

    • Method Detail

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String sName)
        Set the name for this map service.
        Parameters:
        sName - the new name that will be set. A value of null sets the name to an empty string.

      • setLayers

        void setLayers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> newLayers)
               throws EMP_Exception
        This method sets the layer list. The updated list is sent to all maps utilizing this service.
        Parameters:
        newLayers - A list of string. The list is ignored if its null or empty.
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception

      • getLayers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLayers()
        This method retrieves the current layer list.
        Returns:
        A list of String values.
